article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 928-783-3333. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

Need an account? Create one now.

og.description: Children who feel loved and cherished thrive. That doesn’t mean kids who are loved. There are plenty of kids whose parents love them, yet they don’t thrive for whatever reason. The kids who thrive are the ones who feel loved, accepted and cherished for exactly who they are.
og.title: Family Focus: Cherishing Your Children

article_metadata.description: Children who feel loved and cherished thrive. That doesn’t mean kids who are loved. There are plenty of kids whose parents love them, yet they don’t thrive for whatever reason. The kids who thrive are the ones who feel loved, accepted and cherished for exactly who they are.
